page.title: 07ENERGY
page.content: ENERGY RESOURCES:WOODLOGS. NO LOCAL MAJOR ENERGY PRODUCTION INSTALLATIONS. ENERGY USED: LIQUID PETROLEUM,GAS,OIL, COAL,ELECTRICITY,PETROL,DIESEL,LOGS. SUPPLY: ELECTRICITY NATIONAL GRID. LPG.OIL,COAL DELIVERED BY LORRY FROM OTHER AREAS.PETROL,DIESEL FROM GARAGES OUTSIDE GRID. MOST HOUSEHOLDS USE COMBINATION ENERGY RESOURCES.THE MAJORITY USE ELECTRICITY.SOLID FUEL IS WIDELY USED FOR HEATING WITH MODERNISED HOUSES USING GAS OR OIL FOR HEATING AND COOKING.TRANSPORT AND STANDBY GENERATORS USE PETROL OR DIESEL. THIS GRID AREA IS ALMOST DEPENDENT ON EXTERNAL SOURCES FOR ITS ENERGY REQUIREMENTS.
